comments.body: Can you please reference where this patch originated in a comment? Probably mention the issue (with ref) and the commit (also with ref) you used.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@    # solution from https://github.com/enthought/pyface/commit/06d85f8
    # and raise syntax fix from https://github.com/enthought/pyface/pull/211
    - pyface_fix.patch

build:

comments.body:
`#188` -> `issues/188`

Also, could we please have a one line summary about the bug? This should give someone looking at this patch some basic idea of what it does without digging any further.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +10,14 @@  md5: 0468d6a44adba0b70ec5171d1af9350a
  patches:

comments.body: Also, let's put these comments above the patch.
